pageContext.claim: “Because a lot of times I get ready to do a number on these phony networks. And you know, you see those red lights go off, off, off, off. They don't want their viewers to see it. But that's OK. I'm not going to say it tonight, I'm going to say your legitimate media.”
pageContext.analysis: Camera lights going on and off can be the result of dozens of different actions. But it is safe to say that it is not because networks are editing Trump’s remarks live.
